context: Hi. How are you? Can I recommend you something? I am good thanks, how about you?
Yess please go for it!! I’m good thanks for asking
What kind of movies do you like? Maybe a good comedy?
I like anything that’s good to Ben honest I love comedy and action
Did you watch The Mask (1994) ? It's classic and really funny
Omg yesss I love that movie !!
I would also recommend you Mr. & Mrs. Smith (2005)
Great movie as well ! You have awesome taste :)!
Thank you. I am happy that you like it ) How about Friends (1993) ? This is absolutely my favorite. I watched it 100 times
Yesss I watched it. Million time soon I actually might watch it today
How about Home Alone (1990) ? I watch it every year
You can try Borat (2006) . I personally didn't like it, but most people do
BorAt was ehh ok I couldn’t really not get into it
resp: Yes I watched The Break-Up (2006) . I liked it. Great acting
